direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve removing elements from the collection, with similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods remove elements from the collection based on a condition, though removeIf uses a predicate.
Both methods modify the collection by removing elements, though retainAll keeps only the elements in the specified collection.
Both methods remove elements from the collection, though clear removes all elements while removeAll removes only those in the specified collection.
Both methods affect the internal state of the collection, requiring reindexing after modification.
